So I have good news for those who are having trouble downloading this cuz the link is broke. I have Frostwire for downloading music and Vuze for downloading bittorrent. What I did was instead of clicking on the green arrow I clicked on the magnet next to it which made it start downloading it in Frostwire and from there I moved it from my Frostwire library to Vuze where it seemed to download faster. After that I erased it from Frostwire , closed out Frostwire and let it continue to finish downloading with Vuze. Now I have season 3....hope that helps people.
